text: ane tame te loko sathe ja raho je'o potana palanaharane savara-sanja pokare che ane teni khusi prapta karavani iccha dharave che, khabaradara! Tamari najara te lokothi hathavi na jo'i'e ke duniyana jivanana thatha-matha mam lagi ja'o, ju'o tenum kahyum na manaso, jene mem mara namana smaranathi dura rakhyo che ane je potani maneccha'oni pachala padyo che ane jenum karya hada vatavi gayum che
